title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Intensive Training on Core Pharmaceutical Chemistry Concepts Using Smart Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic pharmaceutical and chemical theories, along with foundational knowledge of drug mechanisms
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Students can analyze intermolecular interactions with 80% accuracy using PhET simulation tools.
Students can independently perform pharmaceutical chemistry problem-solving processes five or more times using an AI chatbot.
Quizzes and feedback systems within the LMS achieve 90% mastery of core concepts and enable the development of targeted improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
